testimonials.name: example testimonial
testimonials.text: Absolutely amazing! The dance floor was packed all night and everyone is still talking about how great the music was. Thank you for making our wedding so special!

testimonials.name: example testimonial
testimonials.text: Professional, punctual, and incredibly talented. Our company holiday party was a huge success thanks to the perfect mix of music.

testimonials.name: example testimonial
testimonials.text: Hired for my 40th birthday and it was the best party I've ever had. Knew exactly how to read the room and keep everyone dancing.

testimonials.name: example testimonial
testimonials.text: A true professional who consistently delivers high-energy sets. Our Friday nights have never been better since bringing them on as a resident.
